job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to comprehending customer needs and aligning technical solutions with business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Identify deep insights from customer engagements and partner with the product group on using customer needs and insights to guide future product roadmap
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the role's involvement in understanding customer needs and influencing product development based on those insights.

job_tasks.phrase: help them make good design decisions specifically around building good AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in the design and implementation of AI solutions, which falls under the modeling aspect.

job_tasks.phrase: coding sprints working alongside ISE engineers and customer engineers
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to participating in software development cycles.

job_tasks.phrase: Be a hands-on software engineer where needed, so youll need to be able to write quality code.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the need for hands-on software engineering and writing code.

job_tasks.phrase: specifically around building good AI solutions, for example ML Ops.
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'ML Ops' directly points to operations engineering for ML models.

soft_skills.phrase: broad experience in the AI space and the ability to quickly upskill and unblock others is the key to success.
team up with other ISE engineers on customer engagements
By interacting with our customers engineering teams and Microsofts product engineering teams
working alongside ISE engineers and customer engineers
Collaborate with other members of the team and the broader organization
develop broadly applicable, high-impact solution patterns and open-source software assets that contribute to the Microsoft platform.
strategically invest in building reusable assets and playbooks built from our customer experiences.
applying your skills, perspectives, and creativity to grow as engineers and help solve our customer challenges.

classification.rationale: The role emphasizes building AI solutions and specifically mentions ML Ops, aligning with an ML Engineer profile. While it involves software development, the core focus appears to be on the AI/ML aspect rather than purely user-facing application development.
